title: FUCK YOU RIOT
body: FUCK YOU FOR YOUR  DUMPASS SYSTEM IN LOL  AND FOR PLACING ME IN MY ALL RANKED GAMES WITH RETARDS WHO HAVE JUST STARTED LEARNING THE BASICS OF PLAYING!!!! LITERARY FUCK YOU.

replies.body: Remember: Matchmaking will try it's best to match you with equally skilled players!
That's not true. So false because if that is the case how is one player so skilled and the rest so bad. Equally skilled what a joke

Because inconsistency exists, especially in the lower skill brackets. A player could carry one game then lose the team the game the next. That experience is exaggerated in lower ranks because the breadth of experience (and therefore adaptability) is lower.
I like the way your brain thinks

Matchmaking can ultimately only match you based on your average skill, so any player deviating from their average will have a corresponding advantage or disadvantage in game, and that will naturally affect their team. Of course queue health is also an issue, but it's not so easily addressed because it comes down to population.

1. why are you on the OCE boards?

2. Riot know their is a problem in Bronze/Silver with experience/skill difference which is why they are adding a new rank next season to separate people in lower ranks more.

3. Calm down (and git gud)
